name: Dead Together
description:
This game is made in 48 hours during the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

This is a 2 player game, played locally (one keyboard)

PLOT

2 Lovers decide to die after their families would not let them be together. They think that, after death, their souls would be JOINED TOGETHER and then live peacefully.

They must work together to achieve their death.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Due to the time constraint, I could only make 3 levels, but this game has a lot of potential if more time has been given to the development.

 Do comment if you enjoy the game :D

Controls - 

Player 1 - WASD 

Player 2 - Arrow Keys

Rate the game here - https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021/rate/1084098
